ovdesc.p: The Derivatives module is able to store multiple prices for any unique contract traded in the system. A unique contract is defined as a product (contract) and a delivery period for futures, and a product, delivery period, strike (exercise) price and CALL/PUT indicator for options. The multiple prices are stored in PRICE.SETS.

The prices stored in the PRICE.SETS can be updated using various methods called PRICE.SOURCES. These sources can be manual input, internal calculation routines (e.g.Black & Scholes), external data feed (e.g. Reuters) or client specific routines.
This application enable the module to call the correct price source routine when an updated price is required.
